title: Pop Quiz Announced in Paper
subtitle: Did a journalism instructor announce a pop quiz by running an ad in the morning paper?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A journalism professor who promises at the beginning of the semester that he will never give an unannounced test surprises his class one day with a pop quiz. Over the students' protests, the instructor points out that he had run an ad in that morning's local paper announcing the test.
